title: IPHONE 7 PLUS Product Delivery and Exchange Review
review:
Hi,

Recently, I availed the offer of Flipkart , which had given IPHONE exchange.
Offer was really good and got good price for my old iPhone.
The new product was delivered properly and on time, with no damage.
I would definitely recommend for IPHONE exchange with flipkart and for best price.

Thanks
Kiran

title: Flipkart and Apple made for each other
review:
1 st time Apple goes online sale and flipkart as chosen partner . 7 October 7 pm phone launched and iPhone 7 plus was in my hand at 8 pm .kudos to flipkart

Regarding phone u can trust when it's Apple all thing is exactly what's written on site . I find the display superb , the camera is simple the best on earth at this time,Siri works great,calls are clear , I chosen silver coz it's the original color and wud be least scratchy , great phone . And with regard to cost I wanna assure u will never regret but feel proud to hold the best phone on earth at this time

title: Amzing, beautiful piece in my hand!
review:
This iphone 7 plus is much more than mere smart phone.Instead it's an experience!  It's worth spending every single Rs on this. 
This is my short review, i will come back and update once i have enough experience on this.

Apart from good specifications others would have explained in detail, my quick pros and cons are below:

Pros:
1) Beautiful display, sometimes you would just like to keep looking at it :)
2) Good battery life. Once you charge 100%, it will last for almost a day. Also charges 100% in almost 3.5 hrs.
3) Camera: Amazing picture quality and depth. No question about dual camera.
4) Performance: Very quick response time, with app opening, unlocking the phone etc.


Cons:
Not anything major. I get blurred images if subjects move. Not sure how to get max out of OIS yet.

review: They all are cheaters they send me the used phons they are cheater they cheated me they said 10 days replacement n they are not providing serivice.flip kart said me sorry sir contact service center.flipkart is looser

title: Worthless
review: Within 24 hours of delivery of iphone it became absolutely dead. I've called the customer care executives immediately and asked for  the replacement of the product as there was 10 days replacement warranty provided by the flip kart on purchase of the iPhone. The executive told me to wait for another 24 hours since the delivery of the product was not updated in the system. After lapse of the duration of 24 hours  i've again called to the executive of Flipkart; but at this time he denied for the replacement of the product and advised me to go to apple service centre. Very much disappointed with the false commitments and fake warranty provided  by the flipkart. Not even willing to give a single star  for it.
